topic.title: Where do I find useful resources for CTF competitions
topic.body: I'm currently in a national hacking CTF (Capture The Flag) competition, I was wondering if anyone knows any useful resources.

1_1EUyJtat7mbu5wMcR6nrJTPBBRons1mtMA.body: Me too, I just learned about this today. How do I get my own website on here?

> [nofish](#comment_371_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): The easiest way is cloning one: http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.zeronetwork.bit/?Post:3:How+to+have+a+blog+like+this

And how do I do that?

2_1GCsW9TFfjDsvcdmKPADq1n8Q3ha72UtDQ.body: Javascript(node)/Python(pip)/Rust(cargo) Is all you need for everything and they have robust communities as well as being popular.
